bug.author: seveibar
bug.description:
Introduced in 0.14.0, haven't been able to reproduce myself. If anyone has reproduction details please help us out! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1910070/97039710-d6be1500-153a-11eb-96ed-c6b9389ba423.png></denchmark-link>
Clearing the cache does seem to fix this one (does it have something to do with the AppConfig?)

comments.comment:
🎉 This issue has been resolved in version 0.14.5 🎉 The release is available on:
GitHub release npm package (@latest dist-tag)
